pages.text: These bright sparkers are quite precise! So precise, that there is only a small window where they can be successfully harvested to drop anything useful. Take cues from the growth visuals.

pages.name: Precision Crop
pages.text: Flip the page to see the recipe for these seeds.
Dropped from Precision crops. Used to craft Precision Gems.
Crafted from Precision Nuggets, they are used to craft the Precision tools and swords.

Ultimately the real yield from the Precision crops, they are essentially diamond-tier tools. They will automatically have Silk Touch on them once crafted, with the sword getting a Looting I enchant. $(t:+10 Precision Axe: This will apply beheading capabilities to the Axe. +10 Precision Pickaxe: Will let one be able to pick up silverfish blocks and mob spawners. +10 Precision Shovel: Will apply anti-gravity effects to all sand and gravel near to the digger, causing them to not fall at all. +10 Precision Sword: Will ignore mercy invincibility of any mob that it is hit with.)$(9)Hover over this text for more info/$.
